SELECT es.id AS 'mtmyEveryoneSayId', es.parent_id AS 'parentId', es.say_type, es.position_type AS 'positionType', es.content_id AS 'contentId', es.content, es.user_id AS 'userId', es.user_name AS 'userName', es.user_photo AS 'userPhoto', es.is_show AS 'isShow', es.user_level AS 'userLevel', es.create_date AS 'createDate' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_everyone_say es LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_everyone_say_like esl ON esl.say_id = es.id WHERE es.del_flag = '0' AND es.say_type = '1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(es.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(es.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND es.position_type = #{positionType}
AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND g.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND (g.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR o.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%'))
ORDER BY es.create_date DESC

SELECT es.id AS 'mtmyEveryoneSayId', es.parent_id AS 'parentId', es.say_type, es.position_type AS 'positionType', es.content_id AS 'contentId', es.content, es.user_id AS 'userId', es.user_name AS 'userName', es.user_photo AS 'userPhoto', es.is_show AS 'isShow', es.user_level AS 'userLevel', es.create_date AS 'createDate', (CASE WHEN position_type = 3 THEN (SELECT goods_name FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods WHERE goods_id = es.content_id) WHEN position_type = 2 THEN (SELECT name FROM trains.sys_user WHERE id = es.content_id) WHEN position_type = 1 THEN (SELECT name FROM trains.sys_office WHERE id = es.content_id) ELSE '无' END) AS 'showName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_everyone_say es WHERE es.id = #{mtmyEveryoneSayId}

SELECT id AS 'mtmyEveryoneSayId', parent_id AS 'parentId', say_type, position_type AS 'positionType', content_id AS 'contentId', content, user_id AS 'userId', user_name AS 'userName', user_photo AS 'userPhoto', is_show AS 'isShow', user_level AS 'userLevel', create_date AS 'createDate' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_everyone_say WHERE parent_id = #{mtmyEveryoneSayId} AND say_type = '2' ORDER BY create_date DESC
